mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATROOM( CHATROOM_CODE,CHATROOM_PARTI,CHATROOM_CREDTEDAT) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(CHATROOM_CODE), 0) + 1 FROM CHATROOM),#{empCodes},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CHATROOM_CODE, REGEXP_REPLACE(CHATROOM_PARTI, '^'||#{empCode}||'(,|$)|(,)'||#{empCode}||'(,|$)', '') AS CHATROOM_PARTI FROM CHATROOM WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(CHATROOM_PARTI, '(^|,)' || #{empCode} || '(,|$)')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT (CHAT_CODE, CHATROOM_CODE, CHAT_CONTENT, CHAT_SENDER, CHAT_TIME) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(CHAT_CODE), 0) + 1 FROM CHAT), #{chatroomCode}, #{chatContent}, #{chatSender}, #{chatTime})
